title: Modulation of Crystallization Kinetics Using a Guest Acceptor for High-Performance Organic Solar Cells with 19.8% Efficiency
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02657H, Paper
Lin Xie, Zhenyu Chen, Daobin Yang, Xueliang Yu, xinyu tong, Jinfeng Ge, Wei Song, Shuncheng Yang, Jintao Zhu, Pengfei Ding, Guanghao Lu, Xuke Li, Ming Long, Jing Li, Quan Liu, Bingsuo Zou, Tao Liu, Ziyi Ge
Controlling the aggregation and crystallization kinetics of donors and acceptors is crucial for forming the desired morphology of the active layer, which heavily determines the power conversion efficiency (PCE) of...
